channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Texas House poised to advance controversial Republican redistricting plan
item.description: House Bill 4, the redistricting legislation, is the only item on the lawmakers' agenda when they reconvene on Wednesday.

item.title: Fire still burning in one of world's tallest trees after three days
item.description: With about 50 ft already lost, the fire may impact the Doerner Fir's standing in global height rankings, officials say.

item.title: Why Donetsk matters so much for Ukraine's defences
item.description: For Ukraine to lose western Donetsk would mean the fall of a bulwark against any future Russian advance.

item.title: Watch: JD Vance heckled as he meets National Guard in Washington DC
item.description: Protesters shouted at Vance, Pete Hegseth and Stephen Miller as they entered DC's largest rail hub.

item.title: 4 reasons why the Trump tariffs haven't caused U.S. inflation to soar
item.description: For months, economists warned that the Trump administration's sweeping tariffs would sharply boost consumer prices. Here's why it hasn't happened.

item.title: Israel approves controversial West Bank settlement project
item.description: The Palestinian Authority says the decision is illegal and will "destroy" the prospects for a two-state solution.

item.description: Hurricane Erin is strengthening again and forecasters say it could re-intensify into a major hurricane.

item.description: Call-up letters have gone out to 60,000 reservists to bolster an operation which is expected to last until next year.
